sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_4afd979f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9965
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_251_css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var val = '';
    var target = '';

    var KPI_bds_list = api.data.verticalA_headlinemetric2v.output.result;
    var dropdown_selection = api.state.tab3PortfolioElement;
    
    for(let i = 0; i < KPI_bds_list.length; i++) {
        var KPI_bd_sysid = KPI_bds_list[i].element.value;
        if (dropdown_selection === KPI_bd_sysid) {
        var KPI_bd_score = KPI_bds_list[i].scores[0].value;
        // var KPI_bd_target = KPI_bds_list[i].scores[0].target;
        break;
        }
    }

    val = KPI_bd_score;

    if (val > 97.5) {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#008000}';
    } else if (val >= 95 && val <= 97.5) {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#FFA500}';
    } else {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#FF0000}';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-24 13:52:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4afd979f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9965</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_251_css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4afd979f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9965</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-18 13:45:07</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>00000000</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4afd979f7723011061b80bbc3c5a9965</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 12:42:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>660e29f51bb735d4dba1c3e5464bcb75</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-18 12:42:08</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
